summary: This document is an internal email chain forwarding a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from a foreign source. The email indicates the agency's policy of not responding to foreign submissions and notes the report should be logged.

events.title: Forwarding of Civilian Crime Report
events.description: An internal email forwards a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from a foreign source, noting the agency's policy of not responding to foreign submissions.

keyFacts: A civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein was received from a foreign country.
The agency has a policy of not responding to submissions from foreign sources.
The email instructs the recipient to make a note in the log about the submission.
The document indicates ongoing external interest in the Epstein case as of September 2020.
